com.xerox.xrce.codex.jri.model
Class CxArtifact

java.lang.Object
  com.xerox.xrce.codex.jri.model.CxFromServer
      com.xerox.xrce.codex.jri.model.CxArtifact

public class CxArtifact
extends CxFromServer

CxArtifact is the class for Artefact. Artifact is the generic name for Object tracked by the CodeX trackers. An artifact have some predefined fields (id, summary, severity, etc.) and some extra fields defined by the user. An artifact belongs to a tracker, and a tracker can have several artifacts.

getFieldValue

public java.lang.String getFieldValue(int reportId,
                                      int i)
                               throws CxException
Returns the value (textual data for display) of the field in the report reportID, field in the column i for this artifact.

Parameters:
reportId - ID of the selected report
i - index of the column in the report (first column is 0)
Returns:
the value of the field (with index i)
Throws:
CxException

initArtifact

public void initArtifact()
                  throws CxException
Init the artifact. This method sets:
  • the follow-up comments
  • the attached files
  • the CC List
  • the dependencies
  • the inverse dependencies
  • the history
of this artifact.

Throws:
CxException

emptyUnusedInfo

public void emptyUnusedInfo()
Reset the attributes of this artifact. This method resets:
  • the follow-up comments
  • the attached files
  • the CC List
  • the dependencies
  • the inverse dependencies
  • the history

updateArtifact

public int updateArtifact(int statusId,
                          int closeDate,
                          java.lang.String summary,
                          java.lang.String details,
                          int severity,
                          java.util.List<CxArtifactFieldNameValue> fields)
                   throws CxException
Update this artifact with the given values.

Parameters:
statusId - the new status ID
closeDate - the new close date
summary - the new summary
details - the new details
severity - the new severity
fields - the new extra fields values
Returns:
the ID of this artifact, or -1 if the update failed.
Throws:
CxException

addFollowUpcomment

public boolean addFollowUpcomment(java.lang.String comment,
                                  int commentType)
                           throws CxException
Add a follow-up comment to this artifact

Parameters:
comment - the message to adds
commentType - the ID of the comment type if needed, or 100 if not used
Returns:
true if the follow-up has been added, false otherwise
Throws:
CxException

public int addAttachedFile(java.lang.String encodedFileData,
                           java.lang.String description,
                           java.lang.String filename,
                           java.lang.String filetype)
                    throws CxException
Add an attached file to this artifact

Parameters:
encodedFileData - the content of the file encoded in Base64
description - the description of the file
filename - the name of the file (the end name, no path)
filetype - the mime-type of the file
Returns:
the ID of the attached file, or -1 if the attachement failed.

CxException
